title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
description: When trying to change the data source for a data set on the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed.
OB: Currently, when I try to change the data source for a data set on the data set editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not listed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I change the data source, the new data source's children should be listed out in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the data set editor page on the query tab.
2. Select a data set and try to change its data source.
3. Notice that the children nodes are not listed for the new data source.
